markdown:
| icon           = poe2 necklace_precognition icon.png
| description    = This pendant consists of dirty coin on a tarnished chain. The coin, while worth a few copper pieces, would be refused by any respectable merchant due to the hole drilled through it. Presumably its value is totally sentimental. When worn, however, the coin imparts a strange feeling of confidence, almost as if one can "feel" what is about to happen and act accordingly. The sensation is fleeting, however, and not totally reliable.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Neck
